meanings.definition: The ability of eggs to hatch.
meanings.sent1: The hatchability of these eggs is impressive.
meanings.sent2: The hatchability of the chicken eggs is high.
meanings.sent3: The hatchability of the ostrich eggs made the other birds jealous.
meanings.sent4: The hatchability of the eggs was like a magic trick coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The hatchability of the turtle eggs was a beautiful sight to witness.

meanings.definition: The likelihood of eggs successfully hatching.
meanings.sent1: The hatchability of the robin's eggs is uncertain.
meanings.sent2: The hatchability of the duck eggs is dependent on the conditions.
meanings.sent3: The hatchability of the penguin eggs kept the zookeepers on their toes.
meanings.sent4: The hatchability of the eggs was like waiting for a surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The hatchability of the quail eggs was a gamble for the farmers.

meanings.definition: The quality of being capable of hatching.
meanings.sent1: The hatchability of the reptile eggs is remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The hatchability of the fish eggs is essential for their survival.
meanings.sent3: The hatchability of the dinosaur eggs was a topic of debate among scientists.
meanings.sent4: The hatchability of the eggs symbolized new beginnings in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The hatchability of the bird eggs was a testament to nature's wonders.
